dublin_core.dcvalue: As the number of adolescents in the population is growing it is even more important that healthcare practitioners are provided with the tools and resources that can best educate and connect with those patients at risk in this population particularly with regard to sexual health behaviours Notoriously adolescents are difficult to engage in their own healthcare However with the advancement of technology and the ubiquitous use of cell phones emerging studies suggest that there may be benefits to using text messaging within the adolescent health arena to encourage engagement compliance and improve health knowledge The use of text messaging has been implemented within adolescent healthcare in multiple ways but studies are needed to evaluate the content of messages dosage and efficacy of text messaging in improving health outcomes in this population
Is it ok 2 txt? Reaching out to adolescents about sexual and reproductive health.
